abilities.name: Void
abilities.description: Night Stalker creates a damaging void that slows movement and attack speed. During night, it also causes a ministun.
abilities.notes: During nighttime, also applies a 0.1 second ministun.

abilities.name: Crippling Fear
abilities.description: Night Stalker creates an aura of fear, silencing and damaging nearby enemies. Effect lasts longer during night.
abilities.notes: During nighttime, both the silence and damage duration are extended.

abilities.name: Hunter in the Night
abilities.description: Night Stalker is empowered by the darkness, gaining substantial bonus movement and attack speed during nighttime.
abilities.notes: Aghanim's Shard adds an active ability to consume a creep, granting additional movement and attack speed.

abilities.name: Dark Ascension
abilities.description: Night Stalker transforms into a nightmarish creature, forcing nighttime for the duration and giving him flying movement and unobstructed vision.
abilities.notes: Grants flying movement, unobstructed vision, and forces nighttime for the duration.

innate_abilities.name: Heart of Darkness
innate_abilities.description: Night Stalker's health regeneration is amplified during nighttime but reduced during daytime.
innate_abilities.notes: Amplifies all sources of health regeneration during nighttime by 40% and reduces them during daytime by 20%.
